column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2, presenting the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section. The observation is made on slice n°117 from the right hemisphere of the skull. The section reveals the presence of: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4105.3711 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 5409.2285 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 299.2676 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 465.3809 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1583.3496 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 462.7441 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 205.6641 mm³, the brainstem of volume 825.2930 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 2.6367 mm³, the left nucleus accumbens of volume 72.5098 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 206.9824 mm³.
